content.prompt: Which of the following best describes an argument made by de Gante in the letter?

choices.label: The Catholic Church should abandon conversion efforts in the Americas.
The emperor should sponsor voyages to discover new American kingdoms.
De Gante should be rewarded for his missionary work in the Americas.
The Spanish should require less tribute after conquest to avoid Native American depopulation.

topic.text: 1.4: Columbian Exchange, Spanish Exploration, and Conquest

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe a claim and/or argument in a text-based or non-text-based source.
